reviewText: Now that my VCR does not work anymore, DVD is the best choice. Besides this is still a good movie from my childhood.

A completely impossible story, but does entertain. The bad guy is stupid and the kids are far more intelligent than any i
I've ever seen. It did however keep me laughing. Don't let your kids try the things those kids did.
I remember watching this as a child and thinking it was boring. But now it's kind of corny yet cute. I just got this for the sake of a childhood marathon. <3

A complete waste of my time. About two boys who are left home alone. They basically just fight and call eachother names. Who needs this video when you have kids that do the same thing live!  Do not waste your time and  money on this piece of trash. ( I suggest getting good burger for your  kids)
